questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar cod again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Damage / Incident and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230.

videos.src: assets/videos/B BRAUN – PERFUSOR COMPACT PLUS/VIDEO FOR CHECKING WALL OULET VOLTAGE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO FOR CHECKING WALL OULET VOLTAGE

questions.question: shift the equipment to another place where AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord continuity and confirm whether the power cord is defective

videos.src: assets/videos/B BRAUN – PERFUSOR COMPACT PLUS/VIDEO FOR CHECKING POWER CORD CONTINUITY.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO FOR CHECKING POWER CORD CONTINUITY

questions.question: replace the power cord with a new one
check and confirm whether the N Module output voltage is available.
replace the N module with a new one
check and confirm is there any loose connection / breakage of cable from N module to Control Board.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the ml of the syringe is not being detected.
check for any loose connection or breakage of cable from detector to control board.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
open the equipment as shown in the video, cross check the syringe detector board with other equipment and confirm whether the board or is defective.

videos.videoName: Video for removing the syringe detector

questions.question: replace/ repair the syringe detector board accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly
set the flow rate and confirm whether there is no movement of piston at all.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for any loose connection or breakage of cable from syringe detector board to sensor
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the sensor board accordingly
set the flow rate and confirm whether there is no free movement of piston.
open the equipment as shown, check for any dust or obstructions in the path.
clean the dust
check and confirm whether there is any damage / dust in the gears.
replace or clean the gears accordingly
check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON but the display is blank / plain.
check and confirm whether there is any loose connection / breakage of cable from display to control board.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
replace the display with a new one
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
